name: retil-source
description: Utilities to create and combine suspendable, reactive sources
author: James K Nelson <james@jamesknelson.com>

scripts.build:umd: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --pretty --module es2015 --outDir dist/umd-intermediate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -o dist/umd/retil-source.js && rimraf dist/umd-intermediate
scripts.build:umd:min: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module es2015 --outDir dist/umd-intermediate && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -o dist/umd/retil-source.min.js && rimraf dist/umd-intermediate
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn build:es && yarn build:commonjs && yarn build:types
